message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its worth to me, I'm offering it to you for $140. This price reflects the quality and value we see in the product, and I hope it aligns with your expectations.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $140 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'd be happy to purchase it for $125.  This price is still within your desired range and allows me to acquire the product while staying within my budget. Let me know what you think.
